As a hero, you are destined to fight the evil and protect the continents of Dragon Saga from the dark lord Elga.
To defeat Elga, you will be required to join the Fellowship of Dragon to learn and master how to fight against your enemies.
Form a Party with other adventurers to overcome the burden of your destiny.
It is the first map of the selected continent. Please change the continent if you wish to view information of other continents.
It is the last map of the selected continent. Please change the continent if you wish to view information of other continents.
Click on Map Icon to view more descriptions.
Click on each Item Icon to view more descriptions.
Each equipment item has its own grade, and item can be given various effects by upgrading it. Grade can be improved via Soul Crafting.
When upgrading equipment items, Soul Craft can be used via Soul Force Injection. For Soul Force Injection, a separate item, Soul, is required. Soul Crafting required certain amount of Souls.
Equipment item's base stat can be upgraded via Enchanting. While Soul Craft upgrades item's bonus option stats, Enchant upgrades item's base stat.
The field does not have a mission map.

There are four base jobs of Dragon Saga.
Warriors are well balanced melee combat specialists. Magicians use long distance magic spells with various effects. Archers are long distance combat masters who use hit and run strategy. Thieves are masters of rapid close distance combats.
Each base jobs can be advance to two different second tier jobs which have unique characteristics and skills via 1st Class Promotion.
Choosing a class is a very important step which requires extra consideration.
Dragon Saga provides 4 character slots by default.

The world of Dragon Saga is largely divided into Town, Field, Mission, and Dungeon maps.
Field map is a large space where many users share together to hunt monsters or socialize. Town map is the village and Dungeon is a maze type map with a boss monster inside.
Mission map is a part of a Field map. Various quests are related with Mission maps and each Mission has its own Field Boss monster. Maximum of four players can enter it at the same time and players are encountered by many monsters.

Dragon Saga's battle system is composed of regular attacks and skill based attacks.
You must mix regular and skill attacks to cast chain damages to enemies via combo.
Skills have various effects and they are reinforced by regular attacks in between casting.
It is up to you to discover combo techniques by combining them.

Quest of Dragon Saga is categorized as follows.
Hero Quest has close relation with synopsis, and it is staged around the Mission Map of the Field. These special missions are called Hero Quest mode.
Adventure Quest is ordinary quest system, but it provides extra fun such as connections among each NPC, hidden stories, and humorous dialogs which you really shouldn't miss.
Repeat Quest is quite simple, but it provides various rewards regardless of character level. It offers chance to earn many items that have various bonus effects.
These quests can be recognized by the color of exclamation mark over each NPC's head.

In Dragon Saga, there are three types of items; Consumable, Equipment, Miscellaneous, and ZZ. The items is automatically stored into their slots when picked up.
Toggle Inventory by pressing I key, and press U key to open Equipment window to see your gears.
Dragon Saga also supports Item Comparison system which lets users to view and compare any equipment item and currently equipped item.
Also, there are various item related systems connected to each other such as consumable items and recipe items which can be used to manufacture the consumable item.

Through Community System, one of the most advantageous systems of Dragon Saga, players can conveniently socialize with others.
If you're new to the game, the Couple System will automatically choose an opposite gender character to match you for 1 day couple suggestion.
All common systems including chat, whisper, party, friend, guild are supported, and even Couple and Marriage system are supported.
Friends can chat on in-game messenger and even get extra EXP by exchanging Friend Point which can be earned just by playing with other Friends. The more you socialize with others, the more benefit will come back to you.

Soul Craft takes care of Soul Force upgrade, Curse removal, and Seal removal. All Soul Craft process requires souls which can be obtained from Disassembling items.
You can start by visiting Soul Craft NPC, Julie. She is located in each town.
You can perform below with {C=0xFFFF0000/}NPC Julie{C=0xFF000000/}'s help.

{C=0xFF016295/}Soul Craft{C=0xFF000000/} : Increases Soul Force. Requires Soul and Gold. {C=0xFF016295/}Curse Removal{C=0xFF000000/} :Removes curses on items so they can be used. {C=0xFF016295/}Seal Removal Scroll{C=0xFF000000/} : Exchange 3 Souls with 1

* Guild above{C=0xFFFFF568/} Guild Lv. 2{C=0xFFFEFBD7/} can apply to the tournament during'{C=0xFFFFF568/}Time left for Application{C=0xFFFEFBD7/}'.
* GuildMaster can apply for tournament by pressing '{C=0xFFFFF568/}Application{C=0xFFFEFBD7/}' button in T-Board.
* Guild EXP will be used to apply for tournament and 8 guilds with {C=0xFFFFF568/}highest amount of bided guild EXP{C=0xFFFEFBD7/} will be able to join tournament finally.
* There will be 2 different types of battle : {C=0xFFFFF568/}Tournament{C=0xFFFEFBD7/} to decide final challenger, {C=0xFFFFF568/}Emporia War{C=0xFFFEFBD7/} fights for Emporia castles.
* In {C=0xFFFFF568/}Tournament{C=0xFFFEFBD7/}, team who destroyed {C=0xFFFFF568/} Core in the field will win{C=0xFFFEFBD7/}.

* In {C=0xFFFFF568/}Emporia War{C=0xFFFEFBD7/}, defender with Guardian Dragon and attacker team fight for the Emporia possession. Defender has to guard Dragons, attacker has to defeat Dragons to win the battle.
* By {C=0xFFFFF568/}Mercenary system{C=0xFFFEFBD7/}, other users besides guild members can attend the battle.
* Until the battle starts, guild master can{C=0xFFFFF568/}setup Mercenary participation in guild management menu{C=0xFFFEFBD7/} and the setup cannot be changed once battle starts.
* You can join the guild with less guild member by pressing Join as Mercenary Button.
* {C=0xFFFFF568/}Character as Mercenary{C=0xFFFEFBD7/} can receive {C=0xFFFFF568/}Reward{C=0xFFFEFBD7/} as upon tournament results as compensation.

* When guild that you joined as mercenary won, you will automatically recorded as mercenary for next battle and {C=0xFFFFF568/}Priority Pass{C=0xFFFEFBD7/} will be given to you to let you join next battle preferentially.
* Guild member can use Emporia's special functions also as special community place.
* Winner of Emporia War can own Emporia.

To win the Tournament, you must destroy the opponent guild's Core first or reduce it lower than yours.

There is a total of 5 Cores that share the same HP bar. This means, if 1 core has been destroyed, all the other cores' HP will be decreased as well. Even if the core is not destroyed, the guild that has dealt more HP damage to the opponent's Core will win the match.
The war will be over once a core has been destroyed regardless of the number of points and remaining time. Make sure to attack the Core and deal as much damage as possible.
The objective is to defend your core. If you lose your core, you will lose the game. Defense the HP of your core to win the game.
Regeneration Pool restores all guild members' HP and MP once every 30 seconds. However, there will be 30 seconds wait time once the pool is reset due to any attack.
In order to win the Dragon Defense match, you need to remove all of the opposing guild's guardian dragons. If the defending guild obtains the target score, your guild loses the match.
In order to win the Dragon Defense match, you need to defend your guardian dragons. You win the match if you kill the players of the attacking guild and obtain the target score.
You can select area to move when you are dead. You cannot move to the area where is full. Please refer this to your strategy!
There are 5 guardian dragons and they share their HP to others. Which means if you defeated 1 dragons, you will be able to wind the game. Defense team should protect all dragons from attackers.

Ahem, ah, ah, microphone test one, two. One, two
Um.. well.I'm Boris who is the representative of operation committee in the Continent of Wind.
I have come despite my busy schedule to congratulate the marriage of these two people. Hahaha.
At the same time... Asking for your participation in the 23rd highest committee member election to be held soon. Ahem, l shall commence the officiation now.. Um!
These two lovely couple standing in front me are getting married today.
Marriage is like climbing the highest mountain together.
Climbing together even if you fall in between or get tired! That's marriage.
You must stay together with trust and responsibility toward each other beyond love.
That's why lying or being selfish is a nono!!
Desire for item in your partner's inventory? No~no!! One more time, Nono!!
You have to love with pure and true heart without greed and selfishness!
Now, let me ask the bride and groom

In the times of loneliness or sadness..without yelling other than the fire in your house even in irritating and painful moments, even if you win the lottery and become a millionaire! Will you always love the bride and be faithful to her?
In the times when there are tons of cute boys around, without calling your husband a loser or cheating on him even if he doesn't earn enough money, Will you always love the groom?
Good! Now I pronounce you as husband and wife! Wishing for a happy family without the heart of this moment being faded away forever,
I hope you to love your wife and love your husband for the rest of your lives from this moment.
I sincerely hope you would become the happiest married couple in the world! This concludes the officiation.

In Dragon Saga there are {C=0xFF005B7F/}5 types of elements{C=0xFF4D3413/} exist.

By using {C=0xFF005B7F/}[Profession Skill]{C=0xFF4D3413/}, you can make an {C=0xFF005B7F/}Elemental Card{C=0xFF4D3413/} that can be used to combine with a weapon or armor. Elemental Stone is a basic ingredient to produce a {C=0xFF005B7F/}Elemental card{C=0xFF4D3413/}. Gem merchant {C=0xFF005B7F/}Edward{C=0xFF4D3413/} can exchange any elemental stones.

Powerful monsters do have weak points. Each elite, boss monster has a {C=0xFF005B7F/}strong element and weak element{C=0xFF4D3413/}. By making your own powerful {C=0xFF005B7F/}elemental item{C=0xFF4D3413/}, you can kill a elite/boss monster easier.
